<MethodEndpoint

Delete a permitted provider (Admin only)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"provider":{"type":"string","description":"The model provider to remove","enum":["openai","anthropic","mistral","ollama","synaforce","ayunis"],"example":"openai"}},"required":["provider"],"title":"DeletePermittedProviderDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

</StatusCodes>
